ygData.subject: Re: Raising faction with Hall of Truth
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought killing orcs would bring down your faction with the Idigo brotherhood wich are dark elven warriors if I m not mistaken. ... From: Seamus McNeill
ygData.messageBody:
I thought killing orcs would bring down your faction with the Idigo
brotherhood wich are dark elven warriors if I'm not mistaken.
-----Original Message-----
From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, April 26, 1999 3:08 PM
Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Raising faction with Hall of Truth


>From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>
>I would say kill orcs.....ocs and orcs and more orcs....and your factions
>will go up....I have multiple characters....a human paladin and a dark elf
>SK aswell as a few others....My Dark Elf can now enter the Freeport
>through killing lots of Orc's. I have seen all sorts of factions go
>up...i can only assume one of them is Paladins....even though they will
>never like him....i think Orc's around Freeport affect them and they
>should help you get some quests.
>
>K~
>
>On Mon, 26 Apr 1999, Joseph E. Nisse wrote:
>
>> I've recently come over to Freeport from Kaladim and am interested in
obtaining some quests from the local Paladin's guild. Even though I am a
10th level paladin I keep getting told that I must prove myself or somesuch.
What specific enemies do I need to vanquish in order to find worth in the
eyes of the Hall of Truth? Any help will be greatly appreciated.
>>
>> --Bruceson, Dwarven paladin, Tunare
>>
>
>
